api/GroupMeClientApi.html.title: Namespace GroupMeClientApi | GroupMe Client API for C# Documentation
api/GroupMeClientApi.html.keywords: Namespace GroupMeClientApi Classes CachedImageDownloader Allows for downloading images from GroupMe and storing them in a cache. GroupMeClient GroupMeClient allows for interaction with the GroupMe API for messaging functionality. ImageDownloader Allows for downloading images from GroupMe. JsonAdapter JsonAdapter provides a wrapper for to match the and interfaces. OAuthClient OAuthClient provides methods to authenticate a user and retreive an auth token. UploadProgress UploadProgress allows for monitoring the asychronous upload progress of an API operation. UploadProgress.BytesUploadedChangedEventArgs UploadProgress.BytesUploadedChangedEventArgs provides event arguments for an upload change event. Enums MessageRetreiveMode Specifies which subset of messages should be returned. UploadProgress.UploadState UploadProgress.UploadState defines the various stages an upload operation can be in.

api/GroupMeClientApi.MessageRetreiveMode.title: Enum MessageRetreiveMode | GroupMe Client API for C# Documentation
api/GroupMeClientApi.MessageRetreiveMode.keywords: Enum MessageRetreiveMode Specifies which subset of messages should be returned. Namespace : GroupMeClientApi Assembly : GroupMeClientApi.dll Syntax public enum MessageRetreiveMode : int Fields Name Description AfterId Return messages that immediately follow a given message, this time in ascending order This mode is not supported for Direct Messages (Chats) BeforeId Return messages immediately preceding the given message will be returned, in descending order None No filtering is applied SinceId Return messages created after the given message, but it retrieves the most recent messages

api/GroupMeClientApi.Models.Attachments..title: Namespace GroupMeClientApi.Models.Attachments | GroupMe Client API for C# Documentation
api/GroupMeClientApi.Models.Attachments..keywords: Namespace GroupMeClientApi.Models.Attachments Classes Attachment Generic type to represent an attachment to a GroupMe Message . EmojiAttachment Represents an attachment to a GroupMe Message containing an Emoji. FileAttachment Represents an attachment to a GroupMe Message containing an image. FileAttachment.FileData FileAttachment.FileData provides information about a GroupMe FileAttachment . FileAttachment.GroupMeDocumentMimeTypeMapper FileAttachment.GroupMeDocumentMimeTypeMapper provides mappings between supported GroupMe Document Mime Types and Extensions. ImageAttachment Represents an attachment to a GroupMe Message containing an image. LinkedImageAttachment Represents an attachment to a GroupMe Message containing an image. LocationAttachment Represents an attachment to a GroupMe Message containing a location. MentionsAttachment Represents an attachment to a GroupMe Message containing mentions (ex, @Username). ReplyAttachment Represents an attachment to a GroupMe Message containing an quoted message. SplitAttachment Represents an attachment to a GroupMe Message containing a bill-split. VideoAttachment Represents an attachment to a GroupMe Message containing a video.

api/GroupMeClientApi.Models.html.title: Namespace GroupMeClientApi.Models | GroupMe Client API for C# Documentation
api/GroupMeClientApi.Models.html.keywords: Namespace GroupMeClientApi.Models Classes Chat Chat represents a GroupMe Direct Message (or Chat) with another user. Contact Represents a GroupMe Contact. Group Represents a GroupMe Group Chat. Group.MessagesPreview Preview of the most recent message in a Group and information about when it was last updated. Group.MessagesPreview.PreviewContents Brief preview of a message and its sender. Member Represents a GroupMe User. Message Message represents a message in a GroupMe Group or Chat . ReadReceipt Represents a read receipt indicating information on whether a message has been received and read. Interfaces IAvatarSource IAvatarSource represents a generic object that has an avatar or profile picture. IMessageContainer IMessageContainer represents a generic named collection of Message s, along with common client functionality and features. Group and Chat are two possible implementations of this interface.

index.html.title: aaaa GroupMeClientApi - C# Client for the GroupMe API | GroupMe Client API for C# Documentation
index.html.keywords: aaaa GroupMeClientApi - C# Client for the GroupMe API License: Apache License 2.0 Features Groups and Chats (Direct Messages) supported Send and receive messages Push Notification support Support for the GroupMe Image API Support for GroupMe Attachments (Images, Linked Images, Mentions, Locations, Emojis, and Videos) OAuth authentication support Cross Platform, targetting .NET Standard 2.0. Find GroupMeClientApi on NuGet. Sample var client = new GroupMeClientApi.GroupMeClient("YOUR_API_TOKEN HERE"); await client.GetGroupsAsync(); await client.GetChatsAsync(); foreach (IMessageContainer messageContainer in Enumerable.Concat<IMessageContainer>(client.Groups(), client.Chats())) { Console.WriteLine($"{messageContainer.Name} - Updated {messageContainer.UpdatedAtTime.ToString()}"); }
